failure.message: Timed out retrying: cy.click() failed because this element is detached from the DOM. ST11 type Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > cy.contains() This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands. https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom Because this error occurred during a 'before each' hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: '11 - I can see service type...'
